#summary Information about the StarcraftBuildOrderSearch module

= StarcraftBuildOrderSearch =

This folder contains the source code and VS project file for the implementation of our heuristic search based build order optimization. 

The details of this method can be found in our AIIDE 2011 paper: [http://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=view_citation&hl=en&user=teRseTgAAAAJ&citation_for_view=teRseTgAAAAJ:XiVPGOgt02cC Build-order Optimization in StarCraft].

All build-orders used by UAlbertaBot's [ProductionManager] are planned by this system and executed in order by the [WorkerManager]
